author: markt
msg: Creating ExpressionFactory instances is relatively expensive so they need to be cached but caching them is a potential memory leak since applications may ship their own implementations. Copy the caching approach from the ExpressionFactory implementation.

author: rhuijben
msg: Improve transition based xml parser validations a bit by checking for opening
and closing of a document element. Also improve an error message for this
parser, to help me in debugging.
(expat_response_handler): Avoid duplicated code by using an at_eof flag.
Call svn_ra_serf__xml_context_done() to verify clean parser shutdown.
(svn_ra_serf__xml_context_done): ... this and add verification on the
final state of the transition parser.

author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-2925 : Wasted work in InternalQueueConfiguration.checkIsValid(). Apply patch from Adrian Nistor

author: mduerig
msg: Better logging: distinguish between client errors and internal errors when dispatching observation events
